p: CHIKV suspected sera samples with â‰¥ 8 days from onset of symptoms were also tested antibodies against CHIKV IgM using a capture enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA), as described previously [ 24]. Reagents for the ELISA were kindly provided by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) vector borne branch at Fort Collins and Pan American Health Organization (PAHO).
